formattedAddress: 305 E 33rd St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 305 E 33rd St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: We were referred to Dr. Hong from our GI specialist and couldn’t be happier. Dr. Hong is an extremely attentive and caring doctor. He explains things in a clear, structured way, making it easier for us to comprehend what’s happening and what we should do next. During a flare, he quickly helped us get a hospital bed and came by twice to speak with us. Dr. Hong personally answers all of our questions. Despite the ups and downs, the whole time we have told ourselves that we are lucky to be under his care. If you can be under his care, do it! You’ll be in great hands.

text.text: We were referred to Dr. Hong from our GI specialist and couldn’t be happier. Dr. Hong is an extremely attentive and caring doctor. originalText.text: One of the best doctors you’ll ever find.  Honestly a great human being.  If you take the time to read his research, you’ll see he’s invested in finding answers. This also means he’s up to date with the latest treatments.  He’s incredibly accessible and truly caring.  It seems like these days, there are many doctors who are hard to reach.  Dr. Hong and his staff will never leave you neglected.  If you are going through any kind of emergency, trust that they will respond with respect for the urgency of the matter.

originalText.text: Amazing doctor and a very smart, well informed and up to date GI. He is always responsive, open for suggestions and listening carefully. I highly recommend Dr Hong to anyone who needs a trustworthy GI in New York.

originalText.text: Dr.Hong is an extremely professional and attentive doctor. He listens carefully and addresses all concerns and issues.
